name: The mask of the charlatan
data: It increases the users dexterity slightly.
It increases the users charisma a good amount.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat faster than average.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'bargain'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'negotiate'.
